en.title: Keyword – Pirsch Analytics
en.meta_description: A word or phrase that describes the content of a webpage and is used by search engines to match search queries to relevant pages.

de.title: Keyword – Pirsch Analytics
de.meta_description: Ein Wort oder eine Phrase, die den Inhalt einer Webseite beschreibt und von Suchmaschinen verwendet wird, um Suchanfragen mit relevanten Seiten abzugleichen.

es.title: Palabra Clave – Pirsch Analytics
es.meta_description: Una palabra o frase que describe el contenido de una página web y es utilizada por los motores de búsqueda para hacer coincidir las consultas de búsqueda con páginas relevantes.

fr.title: Mot-clé – Pirsch Analytics
fr.meta_description: Un mot ou une phrase qui décrit le contenu d'une page web et qui est utilisé par les moteurs de recherche pour faire correspondre les requêtes de recherche aux pages pertinentes.

nl.title: Trefwoord – Pirsch Analytics
nl.meta_description: Een woord of zin die de inhoud van een webpagina beschrijft en door zoekmachines wordt gebruikt om zoekopdrachten te koppelen aan relevante pagina's.

it.title: Parola Chiave – Pirsch Analytics
it.meta_description: Una parola o frase che descrive il contenuto di una pagina web e che viene utilizzata dai motori di ricerca per abbinare le query di ricerca alle pagine pertinenti.

pt.title: Palavra-chave – Pirsch Analytics
pt.meta_description: Uma palavra ou frase que descreve o conteúdo de uma página web e que é usada pelos motores de busca para corresponder consultas de busca a páginas relevantes.

ja.title: キーワード – Pirsch Analytics
ja.meta_description: ウェブページの内容を説明し、検索エンジンが検索クエリを関連ページに一致させるために使用する単語やフレーズ。

en.label: Return to Glossary
en.headline: What is a Keyword?
en.text:
A keyword, in the context of web analytics and search engine optimization (SEO), is a term or phrase that users type into search engines to find specific information. Keywords are critical to SEO because they help determine the relevance of a website's content to users' search queries. This relevance affects the website's ranking in search engine results pages (SERPs).

For example, for a website that sells garden tools, relevant keywords might be "garden tools", "buy garden tools", or "garden supplies online". By optimizing website content, meta tags and URLs with these keywords, the website can improve its visibility and ranking in search results for garden tools. Keyword performance analysis also helps marketers understand user intent, optimize content and drive more targeted traffic to their website.
